NodeCommTimes
NodeCommTimes

Contains a global map of Wireless Node addresses to last communication times.

Variables
m_nodesLastCommTime
static std::map<uint32, Timestamp> m_nodesLastCommTime

A map of node address to Timestamp objects, holding the last communication time for nodes with this BaseStation.

Functions
updateCommTime
static void updateCommTime(
uint32 nodeAddress
)

Sets the communication time for the given node address to the current system time.

Parameters
nodeAddress
uint32

The node address to update the last communication time for.

getLastCommTime
static const Timestamp& getLastCommTime(
uint32 nodeAddress
)

Gets the last communication time for the given node address.

Parameters
nodeAddress
uint32

The node address to get the last communication time for.

Exceptions

  • Error_NoData: There is no communication time logged for the given node address.
